title: 88. The Dialectics of the Ramayana and the City of Changing Shape with Arshia Sattar
itunes:title: 88. The Dialectics of the Ramayana and the City of Changing Shape with Arshia Sattar
description: How might literature help inform the way we talk, think, and design the city? How differently would we build it? This week, scholar and translator Arshia Sattar brings her immense knowledge of the Hindu Epic The Ramayana to talk about ethics, morality, sensuality, and space and how we might imagine a city of changing shape.
